text: The Trevor Project is an American nonprofit group started in 1998. It offers help to lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and questioning (LGBTQ) young people who may be thinking of killing or hurting themselves. They have a telephone number which is free to call for help and someone to talk to.The Trevor ProjectNew York Times: Campaign Offers Help to Gay Youths ==References== Category:LGBT in the United States Category:Non-profit organizations of the United States Category:Suicide Category:West Hollywood, California Category:1998 establishments in California
title: The Trevor Project
